messages.text:
Hi iant, this change is still needed for windows/amd64
to solve issue 5273.

LGTM.

On Sun, Apr 14, 2013 at 9:21 PM,  <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:
> Hi iant, this change is still needed for windows/amd64
> to solve issue 5273.
>
> LGTM.
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/8715043/

But according to the replies on issue 5273, it does not actually fix
the problem.  I would prefer to see a complete fix before submitting
this, since I'm not wholly convinced it is the right approach.

Ian

On Sun, Apr 14, 2013 at 10:33 PM, Ian Lance Taylor <iant@golang.org> wrote:
>
> But according to the replies on issue 5273, it does not actually fix
> the problem.  I would prefer to see a complete fix before submitting
> this, since I'm not wholly convinced it is the right approach.

Oh, sorry, I forgot to refresh my open page for 5273.  I see that it
does work at least in some cases.

Ian

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=824737065aef ***
